name: Prelim Capstone
body:
# Carroll's Haos Capstone

### **Proposed:**
* **GitHub WebApp**
* **Sorting System**
* **Research**
* **Tutorial**

### **Status**
* **GitHub WebApp**
  * [Completed](http://koreahaos.github.io/hello_github_api/)
* **Sorting System**
  * In Process
  * [HaosHouse](http://koreahaos.github.io/haos_house/)
  * [HaosInfo](http://haos.info)
  * [KoreaHaos](http://koreahaos.github.io/)
  * [HaosTools](http://koreahaos.github.io/haos_tools/)
* **Research**
  * [WebRTC](https://haos-pre-present-koreahaos.c9users.io/)
  * [GitFlow](http://koreahaos.github.io/hello_gitflow/)
* **Tutorial**
  * [GitFlow](http://koreahaos.github.io/hello_gitflow/)
  * [helloBash](https://github.com/KoreaHaos/hello_bash)

  
### Concerns:
* **Remote Presentation**
  * WebRTC
  * Still a edge techm it is fragile.
  * Lacks visual element efficiency.
* **Solution:**
  * [remote Prezi](https://prezi.com/support/article/android/watch-and-present-remotely-from-your-android/)
  * [join.me](https://www.join.me/)

* Product seems thin.
  * **Solution**
  * Create solid documentation.
  * Catalog langauges and skills used during production.
  * Finish priliminary sorting system to bring different pieces together.
  * Automate documentation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
